siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Yogile is a sleek photo management app that lets you store an unlimited number of photos without worrying about running out of storage on your phone or computer.
blogPost.body: Yogile is a sleek photo management app that lets you store an unlimited number of photos without worrying about running out of storage on your phone or computer.
blogPost.title: Yogile - Photo storage simplified
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Yogile是一款时尚的照片管理应用，它可以让你存储无限数量的照片，而不用担心手机或电脑的存储空间不够用。
Yogile是一款時尚的照片管理應用，它可以讓你存儲無限數量的照片，而不用擔心手機或電腦的存儲空間不夠用。

previous.excerpt: RelaxTax is the first App in Austria, that is able to create automated tax returns with an electronic submission & follow up to the Austrian Tax Authorities (FinanzOnline). It is available in multiple languages, currently German & English, with more to come.
previous.title: RelaxTax - Simplified tax returns for Austria

localize.description: RelaxTax是奥地利的第一个应用程序，能够创建自动报税，并以电子方式提交和跟进奥地利税务机关（FinanzOnline）。它有多种语言版本，目前是德语和英语，以后还会有更多语言版本。
RelaxTax是奧地利的第一個應用程序，能夠創建自動報稅，並以電子方式提交和跟進奧地利稅務機關（FinanzOnline）。它有多種語言版本，目前是德語和英語，以後還會有更多語言版本。

next.excerpt: This tool help you generate quotes easily and quickly. Click on "Generate Quotes" button, it will show different quote. If you click on the "Generate Design" button it will generate different look and feel but with the same quotes.
next.title: Quote Generator - Quote generator with automatic design capability

localize.description: 本工具可以帮助你轻松快速地生成报价。点击 "生成报价 "按钮，将显示不同的报价。如果你点击 "生成设计 "按钮，它将生成不同的外观和感觉，但相同的报价。
localize.tagline: 具有自动设计能力的报价生成器

localize.description: 本工具可以幫助你輕鬆快速地生成報價。點擊 "生成報價 "按鈕，將顯示不同的報價。如果你點擊 "生成設計 "按鈕，它將生成不同的外觀和感覺，但相同的報價。
localize.tagline: 具有自動設計能力的報價生成器
